title: EPCC Product Canonical Schema
description: The canonical schema for EPCC products

slug.title: The product slug
slug.description: The slug that is used to identify this product

sku.title: The product sku
sku.description: The sku that is used to identify this product.  Required unless creating a sku-less bundle.

externalRef.title: An external reference for the product.
externalRef.description: The external reference that is used to identify this product.

mpn.title: The product mpn
mpn.description: The mpn that is used to identify this product.

upc_ean.title: The product upc_ean
upc_ean.description: The upc_ean that is used to identify this product.

productType.title: The product type
productType.description: The product type of this product.

name.title: Localized product names
name.description: An array of localized name of this product.

anyOf.title: Localized product name
anyOf.description: The name of this product in the specified locale

locale.title: The locale of this product name
locale.description: An locale that applies to the value of this name.

value.title: The product name
value.description: The name of this product, in the specified locale.

description.title: The product description
description.description: An array of localized descriptions of the product.

anyOf.title: A localized product description.
anyOf.description: A locale and localized description for this product.

locale.title: The locale of this product description.
locale.description: The locale that applies to this description value.

value.title: The localized value for this product description.
value.description: The description of the product in the specified locale.

status.title: The product status
status.description: The publishing status of this product.

media.title: The product media
media.description: An array of digital assets for this product.

anyOf.title: A digital asset instance for this product.
anyOf.description: An instance of a digital asset that applies to this product.

type.title: The media type
type.description: The type of the digital asset.

url.title: The digital asset url
url.description: The url where the digital asset will be served from.

commodityType.title: The product commodityType
commodityType.description: The type of commidity for this product.

attributes.title: The product attributes
attributes.description: An array of attributes, organized by template, for this product.

anyOf.title: A template attribute instance for this product.
anyOf.description: A group of templated attributes for this product.

templateSlug.title: The template slug
templateSlug.description: The slug that identifies the template for the following attributes.

templateAttributes.title: The template attributes
templateAttributes.description: An array of attribute values for the template.

anyOf.title: An attribute for this template and product.
anyOf.description: An attribute that applies to this template.

fieldSlug.title: The attribute slug
fieldSlug.description: The slug that identifies the template field for this attribute value.

bundleComponents.title: The bundle components
bundleComponents.description: An array of components that make up the bundle.

anyOf.title: A bundle component
anyOf.description: The definition of this bundle component

groupIdentifier.title: The bundle group identifier
groupIdentifier.description: The group identifier for this bundle component.

groupName.title: The bundle group name
groupName.description: The name of the bundle group for this bundle component.

options.title: The bundle component options
options.description: An array of options for this bundle component..

anyOf.title: A bundle component option
anyOf.description: An option for this bundle component.

type.title: The option type
type.description: The type of this bundle component option.

sku.title: The option sku
sku.description: The sku of this bundle component option.

quantity.title: The option quantity
quantity.description: The quantity of this bundle component option.

skuProducts.title: Sku Products
skuProducts.description: An array of products for this sku.

description.value: The Hemisphere Pro Extra Large Green
The Hemisphere Pro Extra Large Red

anyOf.title: A sku product.
anyOf.description: A product definition for this sku.

description.value: The Hemisphere Pro Extra Large Green

sku.title: The product sku.
sku.description: The sku identifier for this product.

externalRef.title: An external reference for the product.
externalRef.description: The external reference that is used to identify this product.

upc_ean.title: The product upc_ean
upc_ean.description: The upc_ean that is used to identify this product.

productType.title: The product type
productType.description: The product type for this product.

name.title: The product name
name.description: An array of localized names for this sku.

anyOf.title: The product name
anyOf.description: A localized name for this product.

locale.title: The name locale
locale.description: The locale that applies to this product name.

value.title: The product name
value.description: The localized value of this product name.

description.title: The product descriptions
description.description: An array of localized descriptions for this sku.

examples.value: The Hemisphere Pro Extra Large Green

anyOf.title: The sku description
anyOf.description: A localized description for this sku.

examples.value: The Hemisphere Pro Extra Large Green

value.title: The localized sku description.
examples: The Hemisphere Pro Extra Large Green

status.title: The sku status.
status.description: The publishing status of this sku.

media.title: The sku media
media.description: An array of digital media for this sku.

anyOf.title: A sku media
anyOf.description: A digital media instance for this sku.

type.title: The media type
type.description: They type of this digital media.

commodityType.title: The sku commodityType
commodityType.description: The type of commodity for this sku.

variation.title: The sku variations
variation.description: An array of variations for this sku.

anyOf.title: A sku variant
anyOf.description: An intance of a variant for this sku.

variantSlug.title: The slug of the variant.
variantSlug.description: The slug identifier for this sku variant.

optionName.title: The variant option name
optionName.description: The name of the variant for this option.

attributes.title: The sku attributes
attributes.description: An array of templates and attributes for this sku.

anyOf.title: The sku template
anyOf.description: A template and associated attributes for this sku.

templateSlug.title: The template slug
templateSlug.description: The template slug used to identify the particular template.

templateAttributes.title: The template attributes
templateAttributes.description: An array of attributes for this template.

fieldSlug.title: The slug of the field.
fieldSlug.description: The slug used to identify this field / attribute.

type.title: The field type
type.description: The type of the field / attribute.

value.title: The field value
value.description: The value of the field / attribute.
